# Biostatistics course

Bill Perry

This course will serve as an introduction to reproducible data analysis using R. Specifically the goal is to introduce students to all facets of managing a research project and anlyzing and presenting the data in a manuscript.

When you go to these pages there are other formats such as word and powerpoint you can download
